txt.en: 'So you are not happy with your ashen pony? Well, I can offer you an exchange, as I would not want one of my horses where it was not desired. However, this is not a decision to take lightly, so I will give you a moment to think about this.\n\n'If you are really sure you wish to exchange your ashen pony, speak to me again, and I will give you a receipt in return. You can then exchange the receipt for an ashen pony or horse.'

'So you have decided you want to exchange your ashen after all? So be it. Look over this receipt and tell me if it looks fine to you.\n\n'And this time, I hope you are more sure of your choice. Choosing a pony should not be something done lightly!'
Cam Applewood has told you that you can exchange your ashen pony for another ashen horse or pony.
Give your ashen pony to Cam

Cam Applewood is at the Hengstacer Farm, north of the Bree Festival Grounds.\n\nCam suggested you take a moment to consider whether or not you wish to exchange your horse. If you decide you do want to exchange your horse, you should speak to Cam again.
